word_mean: 电解〔作用〕：通过流电电流破坏，如化合物在溶液中分解，或除去人体过多的毛发

sentence.Network_en: Water can be reduced to oxygen and hydrogen by electrolysis.
sentence.Network_cn: 用电解法可以把水分解为氧和氢.

sentence.Network_en: The chemist reduced water by electrolysis.
sentence.Network_cn: 化学家用电解法把水还原为氢.

sentence.Network_en: Electrolysis is also used to plate one metal on another.
sentence.Network_cn: 电解也用于将一种金属电镀在另一种金属上.

entry.def: Electrolysis is the process of passing an electric current through a substance in order to produce chemial changes in the substance.

means.word_mean: 1. lysis of a bond produced by the passage of an electric current
2. removing superfluous or unwanted hair by passing an electric current through the hair root
